Projects

01 Jan 2016

Here are some of my projects:

Simply Aware - android application and website mapping the spread of diseases throughout the globe. Made with Java and the Android SDK. Used the Google Maps API.

World View - web app that analyzed the sentiment of world news per country. Used the IBM Watson natural language processing python api.

Bird Watch - Analyzed tweets on twitter to help prevent cyberbullying. Made with Flask and IBM Watson Natural Language Processing api.

Hourly BTC prices - Tweeting hourly bitcoin prices using the python twitter API and a raspberry pi. @HourlyBTCprices
